SEARCH
Package Main

Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main.Main
public class Main extends Object
The Main class is the entry point of the application. It provides methods for loading customers and employees, displaying menus, and executing user choices.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method is the entry point of the application. It loads customers and employees, and displays the main menu.
      Parameters:
      args - Unused

    • loadCustomers

      public static ArrayList<Customer> loadCustomers()
      Loads customers from JSON files in the 'JSON Files' directory of the 'Customers' package.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Customer objects.

    • loadEmployees

      public static ArrayList<Employee> loadEmployees()
      Loads employees from JSON files in the 'JSON Files' directory of the 'Retail_Operations' package.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Employee objects.

    • customerMenu

      public static void customerMenu(Customer customer)
      Displays the customer menu and executes the user's choice.
      Parameters:
      customer - The logged in customer.

    • employeeMenu

      public static void employeeMenu(Employee employee)
